title: Megan Blake Irwin wears a very NSFW Halloween outfit in Beverly Hills
text:
She's the Australian model who split from billionaire David Mimran, 47, last year after a whirlwind romance.

And on Sunday, Megan Blake Irwin showed her ex what he was missing as she stepped out in a daring Halloween costume.

The 25-year-old, who was previously linked to reality star Scott Disick, turned heads in a gold latex dress that completely exposed her left breast.

Turning heads: Australian model Megan Blake Irwin (centre) wore a very NSFW Halloween outfit in Beverly Hills on Sunday night

Megan made sure her outfit was Instagram-safe by covering up her exposed nipple with a glittering, star-shaped tassel.

She opted for a face full of professionally-applied makeup, including nude lipstick, black eyeshadow and mascara.

The IMG-signed model completed her look with a long white wig, and accessorised with a bejewelled crown.

Glammed up: The 25-year-old opted for a face full of professionally-applied makeup, including nude lipstick, black eyeshadow and mascara

Before heading out, Megan took to Instagram to share a video of herself getting glammed up for the evening.

After splitting from David last year, Megan began dating Rocco Basilico, who is the CEO of Luxottica-owned eyewear brand Oliver Peoples.

The couple went public with their romance when Megan shared a photo to Instagram of herself kissing Rocco, alongside the caption: 'Happy birthday, my love'

Happily in love: After splitting from billionaire David Mimran last year, Megan began dating Rocco Basilico (pictured), who is the CEO of Luxottica-owned eyewear brand Oliver Peoples

Megan's break-up with David, who is two decades her senior, became public knowledge after fans noticed they had stopped posting about each other on Instagram.

During the early days of their relationship, the Australian beauty would often boast about the pair's spiritual connection.

David is the heir to a French sugar fortune.
description: She's the Australian model who  split from billionaire David Mimran, 47, last year after a whirlwind romance.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
